name: Coconut Pound Cake
author: Janie Carter
summary: My grandchildren love this recipe for a coconut-flavored pound cake.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease and flour a 10 inch tube pan
In a large bowl, cream together 2 cups sugar and the butter
Fold in the eggs one at a time, fully incorporating each one before adding another
In separate bowl, mix the flour, baking powder, milk, flaked coconut, and 1 teaspoon coconut extract
Pour the batter into the prepared pan
Bake 1 hour in the preheated oven, or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean
Cool on a wire rack for just a few minutes, then place on cake platter
To make the glaze, mix together in a small saucepan 1 cup sugar, water, 1 teaspoon coconut extract, and walnuts
Boil for 1 minute, and pour over still warm cake
